Title: Legend of the Boneknapper Dragon
Genre: Animation, Short, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Mystery
Writer: Peter Steinfeld, Cressida Cowell (book), Jeff Snow (story), Aimée Marsh (story), Johane Matte (story), Ken Morrissey (story), David Moses Pimentel (story)
Actors: Jay Baruchel, Gerard Butler, Craig Ferguson, America Ferrera
Plot: Hiccup and the gang join Gobber on a quest to find a legendary boneclad Dragon.
